Changelog for version 2.1 Patch 


MAJOR 

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed a potential script freeze during Battle of El'Halem 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed game breaks if renaming savegames during battles 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed faulty win condition in Benivilla Forest recapture scenario 
corrected win condition issue in Niobes Estate 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed game breaks if spawning entities die 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed a potential error source in Shinna preparation battle win conditions 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed problem that Faramud's dialog was deactivated when whole map was conquered 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed a problem with with Cassia-Dialog that hindered the game to progress 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed carnage training fight that wasn't triggered correctly 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed freeze on some maps when using the LoS tool 


BALANCING 

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Reduced critical hit chance of bounty hunters to zero 
destructible Crystals can now be destroyed with a single melee hit of any damage type 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Lowered damage threshold to interrupt Great Petrifier's eternal petrification power 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Made Zurbaran's Seduction of Niobe more likely to be successful 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Added additional belts to lorfas merchant's supply 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Hammerblow maneuver now causes triple damage 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½More aup damage and exp costs for feint maneuver 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½More damage and exp costs for aimedthrust maneuver 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Additional wound and increased aup costs for sniper 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Reduction of the offhand bonus of dualwield 1 and dualwield 2 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Increased exp costs of dualwield 1 and dualwield 2 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Adjusted difficulty levels "easy" and "hard" to increase the difference (easy is Ã¢â€”ï¿½Easier, hard is harder) 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Increased the wound penalties 


MINOR 

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Corrected Great Petrifier's collision for Line-Of-Sight calculations 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Corrected Great Petrifier's dodge animation 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Adjusted size of deployment zones in several maps 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Improved camera start locations in several defend and recap scenarios 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Increased camera scroll speed on Adamant Map 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed a few missing sounds on interactive environment 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Reduced resistances of insect warrior in Lorfas 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Optimized functionality of arsonist objectives in Dujar Looting and Cuoris Sabotage fights 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed a problem in battle of mengbilla battle-script that hindered catapult impacts if cassia was very good or very evil 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Added hint for treasure chests 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed minor issues with barrel towers in a couple of maps 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Added more cheering to arena battle 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Made traps and interactive objects trigger if entities spawn on them 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed a potential dialog bug in the goblin mine 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Set Leaper's jump attack effects to -forced- to avoid victims to sometimes remain unaffected 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed an issue with 3d models not disappearing in escape zones 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed dialog after losing preparation battle for first chimerologist 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed Nasrin's stats, items and portrait 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Removed spider webs' spike damage resistance 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Corrected win conditions timing issues in several defend and recap scenarios 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed an AI problem in Marwan Strikes Back scenario 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Reduced enemy spawn in goblin mine defend scenario 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed berserk elixir 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Removed two potential error sources in archer AI scripts 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Tykates now vanishes correctly from his cage when released or executed 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Repaired missing texture link in Jester Wood gore 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Corrected hex cell height levels in a few maps 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Improved AI script interaction with Ecliptifactus entities 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Added hint boxes for chimera conversions with the Hell Organ 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed a problem with partial success in El Halem preparation battle 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed swamphole script so it properly reacts to knocked back entities 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed dialog timing in Adamant battle 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Repaired Morfu sounds 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed problem that Takate and Zurbaran were set inactive when their dialogs are done. 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed broken narrator-screen prior to ElHalem. 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed some Problems with Riz' dialogs 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed dialog option about saving Mirai in Marwan's throneroom 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed problem that bits of dialog may repeat in Niobe/Zurbaran-Dialogs and in Ã¢â€”ï¿½Takate's dialog in the camp 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed some minor dialog-problems 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed problem with achievements "The Saint" and "The Monster" 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed Knockback so it no longer pushes victims through Fortifex walls 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed the Screen of "four years later" just displaying "4" in Japanese 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Corpofrigo lvl4 no longer breaks if cast on a neutral object 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed an issue with difficulty levels are not being applied correctly 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Added tooltip for difficulty level option 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Odded path-dots on worldmap that were missing when re-entering from the camp 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Opening the tutorial in battle no longer breaks the interface 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Improved font rendering on high resolutions 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed some resolutions not working correctly 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Ecliptifactus clone can no longer use the 'guard' action 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed issue with traps not working after un-/selecting them multiple times

Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed battlelog not showing correct number of wounds 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed multiple errors in the comparison of item effects 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed auto-sequence not stopping speech if skipped 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Removed need to click right mouse button after using a free action (e.g. throwing a weapon) 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Converted creatures no longer trigger attacks of opportunity from the own team 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Multiple small visual fixes 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Solved a few issues with text not scaling properly 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Fixed a problem where two different items with the same localized name in the description box 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Enabled the battle shortcut buttons during the enemies' turn 
Ã¢â€”ï¿½Character story progress buffs are now correctly displayed on the character sheet
